plain-text-property: * Command Central Internal Groupsversion:2.0** Define one internal group per line.* <group_name>:<unique_number>:<user_name>,<user_name>[,<user_name>...]** For example:** Viewers:2:Developer* Operators:3:Operator** To remove a group, delete the line.* DO NOT DELETE Administrators group* DO NOT DELETE Administrator user from the Administrators groupAdministrators:1:Administrator
